scripts.say: Apparently, Newport City was attacked by Sirens shortly after we arrived. I had lost consciousness during the turmoil...
Commander, we've been caught off guard... They somehow managed to get through without being detected by the radar screen...
The situation is looking very dire now. The entire Newport Harbor has gone up in flames, and we've lost most of our facilities.
We've begun rescue, evacuation, and triage operations, but things are only going to get worse unless we break their siege and stop their airstrikes.
I suppose that's to be expected, though... We let our guard down because Newport was far from the front lines...
What I want to know is, radar aside, how were they able to slip such a large-scale attack force past the patrols? What in the world is going on?
We'll have plenty of time to think about that later.
Right now, Hornet is out there searching for the Sirens' main fleet. With these kinds of numbers, it's going to be too much for her to handle.
Besides, if they're going to attack us on our home soil, then we'll have to give 'em a taste of Eagle Union hospitality!
That's all I have to say. Commander, please issue the orders for our counterattack!
